channel.title: upgrade on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in upgrade on Reflections

item.title: Hey wordpress guys, have you heard of diff?!
item.description: I hate having to upgrade software. I truly do. I release a version every 3 months, and it try to make the upgrade as painless as possible. For an application like wordpress, that has been around for such a long, I would expect that they would do something to make it a little easier to upgrade. Ok. Sorry about the rant, but here is my problem: the download for wordpress 2.
